component.name: Novelistr
component.summary: Distraction-free editor for Markdown and novel writing

description.p: Novelistr is a minimalist writing app designed for authors, developers, and anyone who wants to focus. It supports Markdown formatting, autosave, a recent file sidebar, theming, and keybind-driven editing.
Toggle between plaintext and Markdown modes with a single click. Organize and revisit recent work. Fully keyboard-navigable. Designed for distraction-free creativity.
